Package org.hibernate.validator.internal.engine.messageinterpolation

Class InterpolationTerm

java.lang.Object
org.hibernate.validator.internal.engine.messageinterpolation.InterpolationTerm
public class InterpolationTerm extends Object
Helper class dealing with the interpolation of a single message parameter or expression extracted from a message descriptor.
Author:
Hardy Ferentschik
